title: As a MNC Admin, I want to see Housing Allowance on Addendum Cs
custom_preconds:
AC:

* There will be a new "Housing Allowance" subsection on Addendum Cs
** Section will appear below the salary note
* Within the new section will be a "Housing For Uncovered Players" checkbox
* Checking this box will reveal an "Amount" field
** Input type will be formatted as currency with two decimal points
* The subsection and fields will appear on subsequent Cs and Non-First Year mUPCs
** Should not appear in First Year MNCs
* These fields will not be editable by Club users after Submission
* If a user unchecks the box after an amount has been entered, the "Amount" field will be hidden and the value entered will be cleared

title: As a developer, I want each build and deployment of ebis to automatically break browser caches
custom_preconds:
The build process for ebis should update a cachebuster with each build to enforce a redownload of all javascript and css files. 

Files to invalidate: main.js, ebislogin.js, ebis.css

title: As a MNC BOC Admin, I want to see a flag if terms have been submitted for a player who has been a FA for 60 Days
custom_preconds:
Flag 8.19: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784591/8.+Flags|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784591/8.+Flags|smart-link] 

AC:

* When terms on a Non-First Year mUPC are submitted for a player who has not been under contract (a free agent) for >= 60 Days, a flag will be generated on the BOCâ€™s Pending Approvals clipboard
* The Flag will read as follows:
** Player has not been on a roster for at least 60 days

title: Partner League | move to use EBIS Okta Authorization Server
custom_preconds:
As a user of both the EBIS Link and Partner applications,

I want to be able to access Partner's API using tokens granted via EBIS Link's authentication API

So that I can programmatically access the API



Note that users will still need the Partner-portal-user group in okta to access endpoints in the Partner API, however, this change will allow users who have both the EBIS-USER and Partner-portal-user groups to use the same access token for both applications.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want PL Request Approval Emails Updated to Include League Contact Info
custom_preconds:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1065|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1065|smart-link] 



AC:

* The system generated email when a Request is approved will be updated to include the League contact's information (populated in [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1517|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1517|smart-link] )
* It will now read as follows:
** Subject: Partner League Request Has Been Approved
** Body:  The Partner League Request submitted by [MJ Submitting Org] on [submission date of request] for [Player Roster First, Last] of the [Partner League Club Name] has been approved.  Please contact [Partner League Contact Name] at [Partner League Contact Phone] or [Partner League Contact Email].
This request will expire on [request expiration date] at [request expiration time].

title: As a BOC Admin, I want League Contact Email maintainted in the Partner League Portal
custom_preconds:
AC:

* On the Rosters tab of the Partner League Roster, there will be three new fields:
** League Contact Name
** League Contact Email
** League Contact Phone
* All three fields will be required
* Only users with PL President permissions will have access to edit these fields
* These fields will appear in a notification email (future story)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Partner League Signings Flagged on My Clipboard
custom_preconds:
Flag 8.18: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784591/8.+Flags|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784591/8.+Flags|smart-link]

title: As an EBIS User, I want Notifications to be deleted after 3 Days
custom_preconds:
AC:

* Notifications that appear on the Notifications Clipboard widget will be removed after 3 days
* This applies to notifications of all types for all users

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to delete a player from the Waivers in Effect widget
custom_preconds:
AC:

* There will be a trash can icon on each row of the Waivers in Effect widget
* The icon will be to the far left of the widget
* Clicking the icon will prompt the user to confirm their action:
** Title: Warning
** Body: Are you sure you want to remove this player?
** Buttons: Continue, Cancel
* Cancel will dismiss the modal
* Continue will remove the player from widget

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see if a player has received a Contemplated Outright Form on the Waivers in Effect widget
custom_preconds:
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2824601613/Data+Discovery+-+Eligible+for+Dugout|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2824601613/Data+Discovery+-+Eligible+for+Dugout|smart-link] 

AC:

* When a player appears on the Waivers in Effect widget, the system will look for the playerâ€™s most recent MJ/MN Outright Transaction
** Transaction Date will be greater than or equal to the Waivers in Effect Date
* If the â€œPlayer given contemplated outright formâ€� box is checked, the widget will display a green check mark
* If the box is not checked, or if there is no transaction to be found, the Outright Form column will be blank

custom_expected:
THEN user will see the following: 

* EBIS-WAIVERS-IN-EFFECT-WIDGET-ADMIN
* EBIS-WAIVERS-IN-EFFECT-WIDGET-VIEWER

AND This will be a BOC Only widget.  Only BOC transaction roles will have the new permissions added.  (Both Major and Minor)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see a Dugout Change Log
custom_preconds:
Wire: [https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#g=1&p=bench_eligible_-_boc|https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#g=1&p=bench_eligible_-_boc]

Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2837119073/Data+Discovery+-+Dugout+Change+Log|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2837119073/Data+Discovery+-+Dugout+Change+Log|smart-link] 

AC:

* When a BOC user is viewing the Eligible for Dugout utility, they will see a Dugout Change Log widget below the utility
* The widget will match the provided wire and data discovery
* Changes made by any user (club/BOC) will appear in the Log
* System made changes will also appear in the Log
** i.e. Position change due to Assign/Reassign TX or removal due to Remove from Org tx

title: As a GCM Admin, I want the GCM Slackbot to access the Eligible for Dugout lists
custom_preconds:
AC:

* While using the GCM slackbot, users will be able to enter a slash command and retrieve the specified Orgâ€™s Eligible for Dugout list for the current day
* The slash command will be in the format of â€œ/dugout + Org Codeâ€�
** Example: /dugout NYM
* The data retrieved will be â€˜liveâ€™ and reflect what is currently entered in ebis

title: As an EBIS Admin, I want the Eligible For Dugout Utility to drive which employees appear on printed rosters
custom_preconds:
AC:

* Checking the Uniform checkbox for an employee will set the SHOW_ON_ROSTER FLAG
* This will be reflected in the Show on Roster column of the Employee Roster widget
** This column will now be uneditable
* Employees with the Uniform checkbox checked will appear on printed roster reports

title: As a developer I want to build out the backend functionality needed for the Bench Eligible screen
custom_preconds:
In order to provide the functionality needed on the bench eligible screen we will need to be able to track employees bench eligible status on a per day basis.

To accomplish this we will need a â€˜EMP_BENCH_ELIGIBLEâ€™ table which works similarly to the PRO_ROSTER table.

The table will store:  person id, eligible date, year, org id,  employee position id, emp roster status id, contract title (if this can be an id, then it should be, otherwise its just the text), start date (first date the emp was added to the list), show on roster flag (this is for uniform flag and will also be linked to the employeeâ€™s show on roster flag in emp_info which represents their current status)

On a nightly basis the employee bench eligible batch will insert a new record for the current day for all employees who ended the day before as bench eligible, all info is carried forward from the day prior.

Removing an emp from the bench eligible list will remove their record for the selected date through the current date from the EMP_BENCH_ELIGIBLE table.

Adding an emp will create a new record in the table for the player for the appropriate date with all their appropriate information and that status will be carried forward to the current date.

if an assign/reassign transaction is approved for an employee who is on the bench eligible list and it changes their position, the bench eligible table will be updated starting with the transaction date and carrying forward their new position to the current date (assuming the employee was bench eligible in any date past the TX date).  

If a remove employee from org transaction is approved for an employee who is on the bench eligible list they will be removed from the list starting with the transaction date and through the current date.

Starting with 2023, the MJ roster report and ebis link roster snapshot process will reference the new bench eligible tableâ€™s show on roster flag when looking historically at rosters rather than using the person_snapshot table.

**we may eventually convert prior data from prior to 2023, this is still TBD

title: As an EBIS Admin, I want to edit the Eligible For Dugout Utility
custom_preconds:
BOC Wire: [https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#g=1&p=bench_eligible_-_boc|https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#g=1&p=bench_eligible_-_boc]

Club Wire: [https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#g=1&p=bench_eligible_-_club|https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#g=1&p=bench_eligible_-_club]

AC:

* When users with appropriate permissions (laid out in prior story) are viewing the Eligible for Dugout in edit mode, they will see a trash can icon on each row, as depicted in the wire
* Clicking the icon will remove the employee from the list
* The Uniform column will also be editable
** Checking and unchecking rows will update the â€œX out of Y uniform coaches selectedâ€� count at the top of the utility
** The maximum number of uniform coaches selected will be 9 from from OD through the Roster Expansion Date.  Then it will become 10.  These maximums will be easily configurable (existing constants?)
** If the user attempts to check more than the maximum, the system will return a blocking message:
*** Title: Error
*** Body: You may only select 9 coaches to appear on the MJ Roster. You currently have more than that. Please revise your selections.
*** Buttons: Back
* There will be a Save button and a Cancel button available when the utility is in edit mode
** Clicking Save will commit the changes
** Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm their action
** If they confirm, any changes made will be dismissed

title: As an EBIS Admin, I want to add a Member to the Eligible for Dugout utility
custom_preconds:
BOC Wire: [https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#g=1&p=bench_eligible_-_boc|https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#g=1&p=bench_eligible_-_boc]

Club Wire: [https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#g=1&p=bench_eligible_-_club|https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#g=1&p=bench_eligible_-_club]

AC:

* When Club users with Admin permissions are viewing the Eligible for Dugout utility for the current day, there will be an active Edit button
** The Edit button will not be active when Club users are viewing any day other than the current day
** Club users may only edit their own Org
* When BOC users with Admin permissions are viewing the utility for the current day, or a past day, there will be an active Edit button
* When the utility is in edit mode, there will be an â€˜Add Employeeâ€™ button
* Clicking the button will add a row to the bottom of the utility
* The Name column will be a select2 dropdown populated with all employees currently assigned to the Org being viewed
** This is only on new rows, there is no editing of previously added/saved rows
* If the added employee has an Approved or Submit Signed UEC covering the current year, the Contract Title and Position columns will be populated from the UEC.
** If the employee does not have a UEC, Title will be an editable text box.  Position will be blank and not editable.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to easily clear all social media consents
custom_preconds:
AC:

* In the footer of the Social Media utility, there will be a â€œClear All Consentsâ€� button
* Only BOC Admins will see this button
* Clicking this button will force the user to confirm their action:
** Title: Warning
** Body: This is a permanent action and can not be undone.  Do you wish to continue?
** Buttons: Continue, Back
* Clicking Back, dismisses the modal
* Clicking continue will clear all Social Media Consent flags

title: As an R4 User, I want to see ebisID on the R4 Signing Bonus Utility Exports
custom_preconds:
* When exporting the Rule 4 Signing Bonus Utility to Excel, there will be a new ebisID column
** It will be to the immediate left of Player column and right of Org Shortname

title: BO Okta Authentication for eBIS Reporting/Printing
custom_preconds:
Please review the BO API information so we can leverage Okta authentication for BO reporting in eBIS rather than LDAP authentication

Per Charles, we will want a particular account to have the minimum rights to update user groups directly in eBIS

----

Business Intelligence Platform RESTful Web Service Developer Guide ; Authentication starts on pg 37

Managing User Groups starts on pg 167 of above pdf file

title: Invalidate all old static file caches (html, css, js) on new releases
custom_preconds: We put in a temporary fix for the 2022.10 release for login.html and ebisLogin.js, but for future releases, we should ensure that all static files are not cached by the browser. The easiest way to accomplish this would be to include the build version in the filename (or as an unused query parameter when downloading the file, e.g. ?version=2023.1)

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via Text
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - When a player memo is sent, EBIS will send the memo to all players via Text using the MLB Official Contact Info
 - Deliveries and failures will be logged and available for download
